bike.description: Specialized FACT 7m carbon, FACT Az1 construction, semi-compact design, FACT carbon seatstays w/ Zertz inserts, integrated headset, threaded BB

1-1/8" Cr-Mo bearings with carbon 8mm cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set, 3D forged 7050 aluminum, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Specialized Captain CX Pro, 700x34c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Specialized Captain CX Pro, 700x34c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Body Geometry Phenom Comp w/ hollow Cr-Mo rails
Specialized Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
